item.description:
Meet at 6 pm for Coffee inside the Barnes & Noble Bookstore at the Starbucks

section.

Then before 7 p.m. we will head into the North Haven theater for

"The Last Exorcism Part 2"

A)

As Nell Sweetzer tries to build a new life after the events of the first movie,

the evil force that once possessed her returns with an even more horrific plan.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2034139/

www.imdb.com/title/tt2034139/

B)

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Last_Exorcism_Part_II

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Last_Exorcism_Part_II

C)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BySJLmciR5E

www.youtube.com/watch?v=BySJLmciR5E

This MU depends on the weather.

If there is bad weather then this MU will be cancelled.

I have a longer drive than some of those others who might

be attending this event so I need to go based on my

commute to this event.

If you are not coming, then you do not have to

RSVP No.

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at North Haven Barnes & Noble in the Starbucks section.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone @ The Last Exorcism Part II
